00013 // Dictionary keys used in BkmxFileProperties dictionaries 
00014 // which are used in more than one Extore subclass
00015 // Subclasses may add their own.
00016 #define KEY_FILE_HEADER @"fileHeader"           //  NSString*  Used in OmniWeb and Opera.
00017 #define KEY_FILE_SUBHEADER @"fileSubheader" //  NSString*  Used in OmniWeb and Opera.
00018 #define KEY_FILE_FOOTER @"fileFooter"           //  NSString*  Used in OmniWeb and Opera.

00025 @interface Extore : NSObject <Startainer, SSYErrorHandler> {

00195 /*
00196  @brief    An in-memory, <i>transient</i> or <i>transfer</i> managed
00197  object context, structured like the external store, used during
00198  ixternalizations.
00199 
00200  @details  If the instance variable transMoc is nil, a
00201  new managed object context is created and immediately
00202  loaded by reading from the external store.
00203  
00204  The container structure of the items in the moc is
00205  that of the external store.
00206  */
00207 @property (retain, readonly) NSManagedObjectContext*  transMoc ;
00208 
00209 /*
00210  @brief    A sqlite managed object context used to hold Starks
00211  which mirror those in a not-always-accessible external store.
00212 
00213  @details  This is used by stores such as ExtoreDelicious whose
00214  external store is not always available, and/or whose API
00215  requires that we keep a local copy.
00216  
00217  This moc thus holds items only permanently, and therefore
00218  it uses an sqlite store on the hard drive provided by 
00219  SSYMOCManager. 
00220  */
00221 @property (retain, readonly) NSManagedObjectContext*  localMoc ;
00222 
00223 /*
00224  @brief    The receiver's starker, a wrapper around its transMoc
00225  */
00226 @property (retain, readonly) Starker* starker ;
00227 
00228 /*
00229  @brief    The receiver's localStarker, a wrapper around its localMoc. 
00230  */
00231 @property (retain, readonly) Starker*  localStarker ;
00232 
00233 /*
00234  @brief    A shortcut to the progressView of the main window of the
00235  receiver's owning Bookshelf.
00236  */
00237 @property (readonly) SSYProgressView* progressView ;
